entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
